paper_abstract: A new log-domain building block for log-domain. filter design is proposed in this paper. This block realizes a positive impedance inverter (gyrator) by using the log-domain wave method. A simple procedure for log-domain. filter development, using the proposed block, is outlined. This method results in circuits, which are simple in structure and very easy to design. An example of a second-order bandpass. filter is given and its functionality is verified through simulations.
paper_title: A LOG-DOMAIN WAVE POSITIVE IMPEDANCE INVERTER
